document_data.name: Vheod Runechild
document_data.mainbody:
'''Vheod Runechild''' was a [[cambion]] of the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''It often guided him, though he was never sure to what, or if he interpreted it correctly. All his life, Vheod could find no answers as to its meaning, least of all from the Taint itself.''<ref>}}
document_data.Description: He had long brick-red hair, scarred hands, and a "living" red mark that was in flux on his body. Vheod called it "the Taint". He wore spiked metal [[armor]], a simple cloth cape, and used a [[long sword]].<ref>
document_data.Relationships: He was a known companion of [[Melann Brandish]] and [[Whitlock Brandish]].
document_data.History: He escaped from the [[Abyss]] and arrived in [[Faerûn]] in [[Archendale]], where he met his future companions.<ref>
document_data.Abilities: Vheod had an inherent ability to levitate, which was the result of his [[tanar'ri]] lineage. He also had access to [[spell]]s he learned from an ancient [[book]], including a way to manipulate and restore the vampiric briars that grew in the [[Fields of Night Unseen]] in the Abyss.<ref> He was able to conjure flames to create a fire that helped him to survive in the wild.<ref>
